meanings.definition: A building divided into four separate living units.
meanings.sent1: The quadplexes on our street have colorful doors.
meanings.sent2: We visited the quadplexes to see the different apartments.
meanings.sent3: The quadplexes looked like four little houses holding hands.
meanings.sent4: Living in the quadplexes felt like being part of a small community.
meanings.sent5: The quadplexes stood tall, each unit with its own unique charm.

meanings.definition: To divide a building into four separate living units.
meanings.sent1: They decided to quadplexes the old mansion for more space.
meanings.sent2: The architect quadplexes the building to accommodate more families.
meanings.sent3: I wonder how they will quadplexes the large house without losing its grandeur.
meanings.sent4: Quadplexing the property will require careful planning and construction.
meanings.sent5: The builders will quadplexes the structure to create affordable housing options.
